message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth to you might be even greater. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I am offering it to you at a special price of $11500. This is a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire something truly special at a price that is still a premium above the market rate. I believe this offer reflects the product's value while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with the purchase.
